method: In a large mixing bowl, combine flour, sugar, cocoa powder, and baking powder.
Add milk and butter to the dry ingredients mixture and mix until well combined.
Add eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
Pour the batter into a phone-shaped cake pan.
Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Let the cake cool completely before frosting and decorating to resemble a phone.
